undo.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to open something that is tied, fastened, or wrapped
undo.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The screws can be undone by hand.
undo.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to try to remove the bad effects of something you have done
undo.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: We cannot undo the damage of a lifetime in only 30 days.
If a medicine is taken again too soon, it may undo all the good that has been done.
undo.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to remove the effect of your previous action on a computer
